weka.gui.beans
Class TimeSeriesForecasting

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  weka.gui.beans.TimeSeriesForecasting
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EnvironmentHandler, BeanCommon, DataSourceListener, EventConstraints, InstanceListener, Visible
@KFStep(category="Time Series",
        toolTipText="Forecasting using a time series model")
public class TimeSeriesForecasting
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements BeanCommon, Visible, EventConstraints, EnvironmentHandler, InstanceListener, DataSourceListener

KnowledgeFlow component for producing a forecast using a time series forecasting model.

Version:
$Revision: 51355 $
Author:
Mark hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
